## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a46b3e4c4e33a0868efa0749a447d9419}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::remarks::EndOfFileError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarkparser-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarkparser-h">RemarkParser.h</a>.
